name: get_by_origin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool house_plants.
Tool description: This API provides a database of house plants, along with their description and information how to best take care of them (ideal temperature, light, etc.).

All proceeds go to charity (donated at the end of each month).
API description: Fetches plants by their origin using the specified RapidAPI key.

origin.description: The origin of the plants to retrieve. Default is 'Asia'.
